  • Constructor Details

    • GPIOLibrary

      public GPIOLibrary(int pin)
      Constructor, needed to add the shutdown hook to prevent locked gpio pins

  • Method Details

    • exportPin

      public void exportPin(boolean in)
      Lets the user export a pin.
      Parameters:
      in - true for a "in" pin and false for a "out" pin
      n - pin number. If invalid the functions does nothing

    • unExport

      public void unExport()
      Lets the user unlock the GPIO pins for later use
      Parameters:
      n - pin number. If invalid the function does nothing

    • unExport

      public void unExport(int pin)

    • readPin

      public int readPin(int pin)
      Returns the value of pin
      Parameters:
      pin - pin number.
      Returns:
      pin value(0, 1). If invalid the function returns -1

    • writePin

      public void writePin(boolean out)
      Writes a value to the pin
      Parameters:
      n - pin number. If invalid the function does nothing
      out - true for 1 and false for 0

      public ToneThread getToneThread()
